data.title: 101 Fifth Avenue
data.meta_description: Discover 101 Fifth Avenue - Exceptional workspace. Join a diverse tenant community and thrive in the Flatiron District. Lease office space
data.text:
101 Fifth Avenue: Elevate Your Workspace in the Heart of Manhattan

Welcome to 101 Fifth Avenue, a prime commercial building in the heart of Manhattan, offering an exceptional workspace environment tailored to meet the diverse needs of modern businesses. This historic 25-story gem, located in the Flatiron District, boasts a prestigious address and a rich architectural heritage that blends seamlessly with contemporary amenities.

A Haven for Innovation and Growth

For companies seeking a dynamic and inspiring workspace, 101 Fifth Avenue is an ideal choice. The building provides a wide range of office space options, from private offices to flexible coworking spaces, all designed to foster collaboration, creativity, and productivity. With customizable layouts and state-of-the-art technology infrastructure, tenants have the flexibility to adapt their workspace to their unique requirements.

Elevated Tenant Experience

One of the standout features of this commercial building is its commitment to providing an exceptional tenant experience. The building offers a range of amenities, including a modern fitness center, onsite dining options, and an inviting rooftop terrace. These spaces are designed to enhance work-life balance and contribute to employee well-being.

Diverse Tenant Mix

Joining the ranks of prestigious tenants at 101 Fifth Avenue provides access to a thriving business community. Some of the current tenants include tech startups, marketing agencies, and financial firms, all drawn to the vibrant atmosphere and central location. The building’s environment encourages networking and collaboration among professionals from various industries.

Unmatched Building Specifications

101 Fifth Avenue offers an impressive array of building specifications:

Building Type: Office

Year Built: 1908

Building Height: 11 Stories

Building Size: 80,520 SF

Building Class: B

Typical Floor Size: 7,080 SF

Unfinished Ceiling Height: 12’

A Location Second to None

Situated in the Flatiron District, 101 Fifth Avenue enjoys proximity to iconic landmarks such as Madison Square Park and the Flatiron Building. With easy access to public transportation, including several subway lines and bus routes, commuting is a breeze. The neighborhood also offers an array of dining, shopping, and entertainment options, making it a perfect blend of work and leisure.

Why Choose 101 Fifth Avenue?

Tenants at 101 Fifth Avenue choose this location not only for its historic charm but also for the modern amenities that cater to today’s business demands. The building’s commitment to providing an exceptional workspace experience, coupled with its prime location and diverse tenant community, makes it a premier choice for businesses looking to thrive in the heart of Manhattan. Discover how 101 Fifth Avenue can elevate your business to new heights.

Discover the compelling reasons why businesses choose to lease office space at 101 Fifth Avenue. This prestigious 25-story building, nestled in the vibrant Flatiron District of Manhattan, offers an exceptional environment that caters to the diverse needs of modern businesses.

1. Seamless Lease Renewals: Investment bank LUMA Partners has decided to continue its 7,080-square-foot occupancy at 101 Fifth Avenue, solidifying its presence on the entire ninth floor of this 11-story gem. This commitment reflects the enduring appeal and adaptability of the building for businesses seeking stability and growth.

2. Flourishing in the Flatiron District: By renewing its lease at 101 Fifth Avenue, LUMA Partners benefits from remaining in the dynamic Flatiron District, boasting over 27 million square feet of office space. Their custom-designed office space fosters creativity and strategic thinking, aligning perfectly with their mission to provide exceptional client services.

3. Innovative Healthcare Hub: Crossover Health, a leading primary care provider for industry giants like Meta, Amazon, Apple, and Microsoft, has chosen to open a new clinic within 101 Fifth Avenue. Their five-year lease will transform the fifth floor into a state-of-the-art healthcare facility. This expansion reflects the hybrid future of healthcare delivery, emphasizing the importance of physical health centers alongside virtual care networks.

4. Adaptable Workspace Solutions: During the pandemic, software firm Postlight embarked on an innovative project at 101 Fifth Avenue. Redesigning its 4,000-square-foot office space, Postlight prioritized flexibility, opting for an open layout suitable for events and large meetings. The adaptability of the building allows businesses to reimagine their workspace to meet evolving needs.

5. Attracting Creative Enterprises: Online audio platform SoundCloud has chosen 101 Fifth Avenue as the location for its first permanent New York office. Occupying the entire 7,080-square-foot fourth floor, SoundCloud’s decision highlights the building’s appeal to creative enterprises seeking a unique and inspiring workspace environment.

101 Fifth Avenue not only provides businesses with flexible office solutions but also offers an array of amenities, including a modern fitness center, onsite dining options, and an inviting rooftop terrace. Its central location in the Flatiron District, surrounded by iconic landmarks and excellent transportation options, further solidifies its status as an exceptional choice for businesses looking to thrive in Manhattan’s heart.
